overview: This heartwarming drama stars multi-talented Japanese actor/director/producer Jackie Wu, who is half-Japanese and half-Chinese and is active internationally with a base in Asia, starring in this long-awaited co-production with the Philippines. Japanese man Toshiro used to run a small shop in the Philippines and was lovingly referred to by locals as “Tomodachi (Friend)”, and one day after half acentury he returns to visit his friend Edilberto.
title: Tomodachi
